summary:
## UEFA: Governing European Football

UEFA, short for Union of European Football Associations, is the boss of soccer in Europe. It organizes big tournaments like the UEFA Champions League and the European Championship. 

Think of it like a club with 55 countries as members. UEFA also hands out rules and money for these competitions. Right now, Russia's teams are not allowed to play because of the war in Ukraine. The current boss is Aleksander ÄŒeferin.
title: UEFA
